description: Laodicea ad Libanum was a Hellenistic city located on the Orontes River in Coele-Syria.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Nebi Mend

Hellenistic Laodicea ad Libanum is located at Tell Nebi Mend, the site of ancient Kadesh.

properties.title: CIGS location of Tall al-Nabī Mandū

added OSM location using import tool for OSM way

names.description: A name mentioned in Neo-Assyrian sources.
names.details: This name is associated with ancient Kadesh/Qadesh and modern Tell an-Nebī-Mind, located ca. 26 km southwest of Ḥomṣ.
